components.content:
• Minimum Limits Required - $1M CSL (Combined Single Limits)
  • Additional Insured/Certificate Holder:
  • Express Messenger Systems INC

           DBA: OnTrac

      Coverage Selections Accepted:

  • Any Auto No need to list any scheduled/HNOA vehiclesScheduled

                      or

  • Owned Autos, Hired Autos, and 

                      Non-Owned Autos (All 3 Required) List all scheduled vehicles & those covered by HNOA.

components.label: HTML
components.content:
• Minimum Limits Required - $25,000/occurrence
  • Additional Insured/Certificate Holder:
  • Express Messenger Systems INC 

DBA: OnTrac

      Other types of policies accepted in lieu of cargo insurance:

  • An Inland Marine policy qualifies (if maintaining a warehouse)
  • Warehouse Legal Liability policy
  • Property of Others coverage
